page.title: 18Building Trade, N. Lopham
page.content: There are several builders in the village. One of them was interviewed for the Domesday survey. He has been in the building trade for 23 years and has lived for almost all that time in North Lopham. He employs 10 men. He has put up about 19 houses in North Lopham, but he also travels within a 25 mile radius to work in other villages. Apart from houses, he has built extensions, offices, factory units, farm units and has renovated barns. This builder also owns and runs the Newsagent/Stores in the village. A second builder employs 2 men full time and works within about a 25 mile radius of the village, putting up all types of buildings. A third builder now runs a one-man business, specializing in houses and agricultural buildings.
